nodes.text: This unidentified Rebel Vanguard was a male Human who was recruited by Commander Col Serra to join Renegade Squadron, the Rebel Alliances' new elite fighting unit. During his career as a Rebel he was trained and became a member of the Rebel vanguard division. During the Battle of Hoth, when General Carlist Rieekan ordered the evacuation of Hoth, he was force choked by Darth Vader when the Imperial Army overran Echo Base.
